rules.natural: Either raw material batch 001 passes quality control testing or raw material batch 002 passes quality control testing
If the sterilization cycle is completed, then should the final product batch not be released to market, the raw material supply is not contaminated
If the active pharmaceutical ingredient meets specifications, then the final product batch is released to market
If the excipient blend meets specifications, then the final product batch is released to market
If the supplier certification is verified, then the active pharmaceutical ingredient meets specifications
Either the supplier certification is verified or the stability data is confirmed
If environmental monitoring is documented, then under the condition that stability data is confirmed, the excipient blend meets specifications
If the packaging material is compliant, then the final product batch is released to market
If the labeling material is compliant, then the final product batch is released to market
If the batch record is reviewed, then either the packaging material is compliant or the labeling material is compliant
Either the batch record is reviewed or the manufacturing process is audited
If the manufacturing process is audited, then either the packaging material is compliant or the labeling material is compliant
If raw material batch 002 passes quality control testing, then the final product batch is released to market
Either the potency assay is tested or the physical properties are tested
If the physical properties are tested, then the excipient blend meets specifications
If corrective action is implemented, then the root cause is not identified
Either the primary packaging is inspected or the secondary packaging is inspected
If the secondary packaging is inspected, then the labeling material is compliant
If a regulatory audit is scheduled, then quality regulatory affairs is notified
If the compliance dossier is prepared, then under the condition that primary packaging is inspected, the packaging material is compliant
If quality regulatory affairs is notified, then the compliance dossier is prepared
Either the impurity level exceeds specification threshold or the production line does not require investigation
Either the quality manager approves the deviation or if the impurity level exceeds specification threshold, then the final product batch triggers rejection
If the analytical instrument is calibrated, then the test method is validated
If the test method is validated, then the final product batch is released to market
Should it not be the case that if raw material batch 001 passes quality control testing then the final product batch is released to market, then the production line requires investigation
If it is not true that testing the potency assay leads to the active pharmaceutical ingredient meeting specifications, then the root cause is identified
If it is not true that testing the potency assay leads to the active pharmaceutical ingredient meeting specifications, then corrective action is implemented
If the final product batch is not released to market, then the raw material supply is contaminated

facts.natural: The final product batch does not trigger rejection
The quality manager does not approve the deviation

target.natural: The final product batch is released to market

(A1 → G).natural: If raw material batch 001 passes quality control testing, then the final product batch is released to market

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: Either raw material batch 001 passes quality control testing or raw material batch 002 passes quality control testing

(A10 → (¬G → ¬A9)).natural: If the sterilization cycle is completed, then should the final product batch not be released to market, the raw material supply is not contaminated

(A11 → G).natural: If the active pharmaceutical ingredient meets specifications, then the final product batch is released to market

(A11 ∨ A12).natural: Either the active pharmaceutical ingredient meets specifications or the excipient blend meets specifications

(A12 → G).natural: If the excipient blend meets specifications, then the final product batch is released to market

(A13 → A11).natural: If the supplier certification is verified, then the active pharmaceutical ingredient meets specifications

(A13 ∨ A14).natural: Either the supplier certification is verified or the stability data is confirmed

(A14 → A12).natural: If the stability data is confirmed, then the excipient blend meets specifications

(A15 → (A14 → A12)).natural: If environmental monitoring is documented, then under the condition that stability data is confirmed, the excipient blend meets specifications

(A16 → G).natural: If the packaging material is compliant, then the final product batch is released to market

(A16 ∨ A17).natural: Either the packaging material is compliant or the labeling material is compliant

(A17 → G).natural: If the labeling material is compliant, then the final product batch is released to market

(A18 → (A16 ∨ A17)).natural: If the batch record is reviewed, then either the packaging material is compliant or the labeling material is compliant

(A18 ∨ A19).natural: Either the batch record is reviewed or the manufacturing process is audited

(A19 → (A16 ∨ A17)).natural: If the manufacturing process is audited, then either the packaging material is compliant or the labeling material is compliant

(A2 → G).natural: If raw material batch 002 passes quality control testing, then the final product batch is released to market

(A20 → A11).natural: If the potency assay is tested, then the active pharmaceutical ingredient meets specifications

(A20 ∨ A21).natural: Either the potency assay is tested or the physical properties are tested

(A21 → A12).natural: If the physical properties are tested, then the excipient blend meets specifications

(A23 → ¬A22).natural: If corrective action is implemented, then the root cause is not identified

(A24 → A16).natural: If the primary packaging is inspected, then the packaging material is compliant

(A24 ∨ A25).natural: Either the primary packaging is inspected or the secondary packaging is inspected

(A25 → A17).natural: If the secondary packaging is inspected, then the labeling material is compliant

(A26 → (A24 → A16)).natural: If a regulatory audit is scheduled, then provided that primary packaging is inspected, the packaging material is compliant

(A26 → A27).natural: If a regulatory audit is scheduled, then the compliance dossier is prepared

(A26 → A28).natural: If a regulatory audit is scheduled, then quality regulatory affairs is notified

(A27 → (A24 → A16)).natural: If the compliance dossier is prepared, then under the condition that primary packaging is inspected, the packaging material is compliant

(A28 → A27).natural: If quality regulatory affairs is notified, then the compliance dossier is prepared

(A4 → A5).natural: If the impurity level exceeds specification threshold, then the final product batch triggers rejection

(A4 ∨ ¬A3).natural: Either the impurity level exceeds specification threshold or the production line does not require investigation

(A6 ∨ (A4 → A5)).natural: Either the quality manager approves the deviation or if the impurity level exceeds specification threshold, then the final product batch triggers rejection

(A7 → A8).natural: If the analytical instrument is calibrated, then the test method is validated

(A7 → G).natural: If the analytical instrument is calibrated, then the final product batch is released to market

(A8 → G).natural: If the test method is validated, then the final product batch is released to market

(¬(A1 → G) → A3).natural: Should it not be the case that if raw material batch 001 passes quality control testing then the final product batch is released to market, then the production line requires investigation

(¬(A20 → A11) → A22).natural: If it is not true that testing the potency assay leads to the active pharmaceutical ingredient meeting specifications, then the root cause is identified

(¬(A20 → A11) → A23).natural: If it is not true that testing the potency assay leads to the active pharmaceutical ingredient meeting specifications, then corrective action is implemented

(¬(A20 → A11) → ¬A22).natural: If it is not true that testing the potency assay leads to the active pharmaceutical ingredient meeting specifications, then the root cause is not identified

(¬G → ¬A9).natural: If the final product batch is not released to market, then the raw material supply is not contaminated
